mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(TKK_ITEM PK_TKK_ITEM) */ * FROM TKK_ITEM MAIN LEFT JOIN TKK_SUPPLIER_PART SUP ON MAIN.CD_ITEM = SUP.CD_ITEM LEFT JOIN TKK_CUSTOMER_PART CUS ON MAIN.CD_ITEM = CUS.CD_ITEM WHERE MAIN.UPD_DAT > SYSDATE - 7
mapper.insert: insert into tkk_item(CD_ITEM, NM_ITEM, DTS_START, BOX_SNP, ITEM_UPH, SEG_ASSET, CRT_DAT, UPD_DAT) values (#{CD_ITEM}, #{NM_ITEM}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{BOX_SNP}, #{ITEM_UPH}, #{SEG_ASSET}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
